thread.title: Vivendi Chairman Vincent Bolloré Ousts Longtime Chief of Canal Plus
thread.title_full: Vivendi Chairman Vincent Bolloré Ousts Longtime Chief of Canal Plus - WSJ

author: Nick Kostov
title: Vivendi Chairman Vincent Bolloré Ousts Longtime Chief of Canal Plus
text:
PARIS—French billionaire and Vivendi SA chairman Vincent Bolloré ousted the longtime chief of Canal Plus on Thursday, further tightening his grip over the Vivendi-owned pay-TV group amid falling subscriber numbers.
Vivendi said Thursday that Jean-Christophe Thiery, a long-term lieutenant at Mr. Bolloré’s family holding company, will take the top role at Canal Plus, replacing long-serving Chief Executive Bertrand Meheut. Mr. Bolloré... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
